messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=b53bdace3915 ***

test: add shift expression incorrectly rejected by gccgo.

R=golang-dev, iant
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10483045

https://codereview.appspot.com/10483045/diff/8001/test/shift2.go
File test/shift2.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10483045/diff/8001/test/shift2.go#newcode23
test/shift2.go:23: l       = g(1 << s)      // 1 has type int
hum, sorry, this block of examples was taken from the spec, the new line should probably go elsewhere.

subject: code review 10483045: test: add shift expression incorrectly rejected by gccgo.
